values: 宽松的；疏松的；零散的；稀的；放荡的；不精确的；不受约束；无球员控制的；组织不严密的；未固定牢的；未系在一起的；未捆在一起的
松散的打法（体育比赛中）；灵活的进攻策略；发射；放任；解放；（插入式）活动定位销
释放；解开；放松；放开；放开（尤指束紧或紧握的东西）；松开；解放；解除；放纵；放任；射出（子弹、箭等）；不受约束地表达
松弛地；松散地；宽松地；不紧地；不固定地；自由地；随意地；不精确地

synonym.mean: 宽松的；散漫的；不牢固的；不精确的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常用，通俗。指人的精神或东西的松驰。
强调缺乏牢固性或稳固性，不坚定。

word_group.brief_definition: 宽松的衣服
已逃出, 逍遥法外；自由
不受控制；自在发生；放开, 放任；屈服
(尤指对隐私)多嘴, 饶舌
摆脱；割断联系；放开手脚干
未了结的零星事务
言行难以逆料或难以控制；可能不经意间便会造成伤害的麻烦人物
喧嚣起来；混乱起来
处事轻率；不道德地行事
放松；处之泰然
举止略有异常, 行为稍嫌古怪
放松；处之泰然
椅套, 沙发套
半开放式禽畜圈；半开放式圈养
放松缰绳；缺乏严格管理
并列争球时站在前排离球最近的前锋
单间马厩
并列争球时后场处的前锋

bilingual.source: It is usually loose and has a belt.
bilingual.target: 它通常是宽松的，并且有腰带。

bilingual.source: They're usually loose and comfortable to wear.
bilingual.target: 它们通常宽松且穿着舒适。

bilingual.source: The grounding wire of this socket is loose.
bilingual.target: 这个插座的接地线松了。

bilingual.source: The hinge on this cabinet is a bit loose.
bilingual.target: 这个柜子的合页有点松了。

bilingual.source: The doorknob is loose and needs to be fixed.
The screw is loose and needs to be tightened.
bilingual.target: 这个螺丝松了，需要拧紧。

bilingual.source: This screw is loose and needs to be tightened.
bilingual.target: 这个螺钉松了，需要拧紧。

bilingual.source: The bracelet was too loose for her wrist.
bilingual.target: 这只手镯对她的手腕来说太松了。

bilingual.source: This flange is a bit loose and needs tightening.
bilingual.target: 这个法兰有点松，需要紧固。

list.abstract: Loose，是一个英文单位，意思是松的，宽的。
《Loose》是加拿大流行女歌手妮莉·费塔朵的第二张录音室专辑，被格芬唱片公司和莫斯特音乐集团发行于2006年6月20日。这张专辑共收录了13首歌曲，专辑监制由Timbaland担任。

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you cut me loose? I'll open your meat shirt and show you your own heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不如给我松绑，我把你的心挖出来给你看看。

yingyinNormal.en: He was relaxed and loose and calm. Well, Sheldon's a complicated man. He said "Whatev." Give him a brain scan that might be a tumor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿是个复杂的男人。他很放松而且散漫且平静。他说了"无所"。带他去做大脑扫描可能长瘤了。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't tell me a Rathtar's gotten loose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别告诉我有一只拉思塔逃跑了。

yingyinNormal.en: We're done. Done? You break me out to cut me loose?
yingyinNormal.zh: 散伙了散伙？你救我出来，然后甩了我？

yingyinNormal.en: Neat and tidy-ish. But aren't you rather at a loose end?
yingyinNormal.zh: 算是吧，但你不是还没着落吗？

yingyinNormal.en: How do we tip in Abu Dhabi? Have you got any loose rubies?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在阿布扎比怎么给小费？你有碎宝石吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, forget all of it for now. Now it's time to let loose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在把那些都忘掉，是时候释放你们的愤怒了。

yingyinNormal.en: That ball of fluff got a screw loose. Let's get out of here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这绒毛球疯了，我们撤。

yingyinNormal.en: Then, the boys on the Hill, wanting no loose ends, tried to bury me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后，那些家伙们就想过河拆桥杀人灭口他们想做掉我。

yingyinNormal.en: Remember this. You may loose your faith in us, but never in yourselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 记住，你们可以对我们失去信心，但千万别对自己失去信心。

yingyinNormal.en: Mary Ellen is really smart and cute and loose. Hey. Who are you kidding?
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛莉艾伦真的很聪明，很可爱，又很随便。嘿！你别装了吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Alright alright. You're a monkey. You're loose in the city. Where do you go?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有了，如果你是只猴子，迷失在大城市时，你会去哪儿？

yingyinNormal.en: Rachel's the last loose end. She must know something else bigger than the DUI.
yingyinNormal.zh: Rachel是唯一的机会，她肯定知道别的事，比醉驾还严重的事。

yingyinNormal.en: And not just because, without you, we're playing fast and loose with the word "list."
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且不是因为不提你，"名单"可能就不太够数了哦。

yingyinNormal.en: After my first jazz record didn't sell, I turned to a life of drinks, drugs, and loose women.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从我的第一张爵士乐唱片滞销，我整天沉迷于酒精，毒品，女色之中。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at it. Oh. Wallpaper's a little faded, that's okay. Carpet's a little loose. Hardwood floors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看壁纸有点褪色，没关系，地毯有点翘起来，硬木地板？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, George, take a big breath in, then cough. I think your heart's a bit loose. I'll put a plaster on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，乔治，深吸一口气，然后咳嗽。我觉得你心跳有一点慢…我帮你贴块创可贴。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I guess we only have one option. Yep, I don't see any way around it. Bye, Sheldon. See ya. Stay loose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我看我们只有一个选择了。是啊，别无它法。再见，谢尔顿。拜拜了。好好看家。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Do you know how many people can't stand the Kardashians? Our cupcake window will be packed! Cut me loose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干嘛道歉，你知道有多少人受不了卡戴珊家族吗？我们的小蛋糕窗口肯定会爆满，快帮我剪断。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Let it loose, and it destroys everything it touches. Don't ever play with it. You got that? Yeah, I got it. Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，可有的时候它会把接触到的一切都毁掉，千万别跟它玩，听明白了？听明白了。很好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使松开；放松；变得放松；变得较为不绷紧；使（联系；关系）不那么紧密；使（肠道）在排泄前畅通；在排泄前变得畅通

word_family.mean: adj. 松动的；脱位的；宽松的；放松的；懒散的；散装的；散开的；不严密的；腹泻的；不扎在一起的

examination_example.sentence: A pilot from Virginia removed his son's <highlight>loose</highlight> tooth using a helicopter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名来自弗吉尼亚州的飞行员用直升机为他儿子拔掉了松动的牙齿。

examination_example.sentence: How did Rick Rahim remove his son's <highlight>loose</highlight> tooth?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Rick Rahim是如何拔掉他儿子松动的牙齿的?

examination_example.sentence: The video shows him launching the helicopter into the air and flying just far enough to successfully remove the <highlight>loose</highlight> tooth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 视频显示，他将直升机飞向空中，飞得足够远，成功地拔掉了松动的牙齿。

examination_example.sentence: New York City police captured a cow on the <highlight>loose</highlight> in Prospect Park on Tuesday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周二，纽约市警方在展望公园捕获了一头在逃的奶牛。

sense_info_list.en: (of clothes) not fitting closely to the body
not tied together; not held in position by anything or contained in anything

examination_example.sentence: Don't wear <highlight>loose</highlight> clothes, long scarves, big necklaces, or <highlight>loose</highlight> belts — they get caught in something or fall into liquid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要穿宽松的衣服、戴长围巾、大项链或松松垮垮的腰带——它们会被什么东西缠住或者掉进液体里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (说话)不注意的; 不谨慎的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of clothes) not fitting closely to the body

examination_example.sentence: The clothes are usually <highlight>loose</highlight>, with sleeves (袖子) that hang down to the knees and flowing robes (长袍) around the body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种衣服通常是宽松的，袖子垂到膝盖，飘逸的长袍垂在身上。

sense_info_list.zh: (说话)不注意的; 不谨慎的

examination_example.sentence: There is an old American saying, "<highlight>Loose</highlight> lips sink ships."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国有句老话:“言多必失”。

sense_info_list.en: not compact or dense in structure or arrangement

examination_example.sentence: After 15 minutes of climbing over large rocks, pushing past bushes, and slipping (滑) down <highlight>loose</highlight> earth, Grant found a pink figure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爬过大岩石15分钟后，推开灌木丛，然后滑倒在松软的土地上，格兰特发现了一个粉红色的身影。
